css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-3,155,155,155),0.5);border-style:solid;border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:0px;padding-bottom:110px;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;min-width:initial;flex-direction:column;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-3,155,155,155),0.5);border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:0px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:0px;bottom:-2px;left:0px;right:0px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u{padding-bottom:166px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u{padding-bottom:90px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u{padding-bottom:40px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-0890eba3-u{padding-bottom:30px;}}
